entities.name: ron

entities.name: snore
entities.description: Snore is a sound that Harry wishes he had saved for another minute. ("If he could have saved his sn ore for just another minute . . .")

relationships.description: Ron is associated with the sound of a snore, as Harry wishes he had saved it for another minute. ("If he could have saved his sn ore for just another minute . . .")
